Line1.EDC76: Oh goodness. You found one of them. Mistress Braega's works. I thought them lost during the attack. She was quite the scholar, you know.
Line3.EDC76: Thank you, kind wanderer. Little remains of her legacy, but these will surely countenance the good this family has contributed to Scosglen.
VoiceDir1.EDC76: Joy tinged with sadness. Braega (long since deceased), Donan's wife, was the mistress of Firebreak Manor they all loved and served.
